channel.title: Aerial object tracking on Vision4robotics
channel.description: Recent content in Aerial object tracking on Vision4robotics

item.title: Correlation Filter for UAV-Based Aerial Tracking: A Review and Experimental Evaluation
item.description: General tracking structure of DCF-based methods onboard the UAV platform, which can be divided into the training stage, model update, and detection stage.

item.title: Disruptor-Aware Interval-Based Response Inconsistency for Correlation Filters in Real-Time Aerial Tracking
item.description: Tracking procedure of the proposed IBRI tracker in the k-th frame. Historical interval responses are incorporated into the filter training phase after denoising by a novel disruptor-aware scheme based on response bucketing.
